channel.title: Routers :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Many web development frameworks built upon this concept of routes by supplying a router, and object that would store route patterns and perform the routing operation. One popular Node library express, is at its heart a router. If we were to write our Node blog using Express, the syntax to create our routes would be: const express = require('express'); var app = express(); // Home page app.get('/', serveHome); // Posts app.
